Ya and I have him.. Thought I got shafted with that pick.. With (gag) bobby ryans game yesterday im becoming more and more happy with my team..bring on week 1..
Hey how did I end up with 3 goalies?
there are 2 active goalies and a bench goalie.

Exactly Chris. If both "active" spots are filled for a particular position any additional players of those positions are automatically put on the bench. You could technically have 6 goalies if you wanted. 2 "active" and 4 on the bench. But then you couldn't have any spare of any other position. This is true for every position, as well.

Since the season is just around the corner and I see that people are already loving the "Leafs" thread.... so it got me thinking.  Would any fellow OFC members be interested in a hockey pool? No entry fee, just for fun....  Yahoo! has amazing pools, and I could easily set one up if there's enough interest in it...  Maybe even turn it into a competitive keeper pool that continues year to year?
Sure Jamie !!! Do I win if I predict the leafs will NOT win the cup ?? Lol....lol...lets see a template of what you have in mind??

The most popular format is the "Head to head" format.  You go 1-on-1 against another manager each week and you get a "record" based on how you do against them in the stat categories on that particular week. (great for bragging rights as well)  Example 7 categories (goals, assists, +/-, ppp, shots, win, shutouts)  Team 1 vs team 2, team 3 vs team 4  Team 1 goes 4-2-1, Team 2 goes 2-4-1 Team 3 goes 5-1-1, Team 4 goes 1-5-1    Pool Standings  Team 3 (5-1-1) Team 1 (4-2-1) Team 2 (2-4-1) Team 4 (1-5-1)  Records just keep adding up each week.  Great pool for active owners. Nice competitive pool where adding/dropping/trading players comes into play and a bad few weeks can kill you.  And obviously the more managers and stat categories, the better.
Sounds like fun and a great way to meet some new people. I would love to join.
